tool.name: Stemmer
tool.description: Takes a list of tokens and generates a list of word stems using one of the stemming algorithms
tool.command:
Stemmer.py $input1 $tab_file
#if str($stemming_algorithm) == "snowball_stemmer": "snowball" #end if #if str($stemming_algorithm) == "lancaster_stemmer": "lancaster" #end if #if str($stemming_algorithm) == "porter_stemmer": "porter" #end if

param.name: input1
param.label: Select a suitable input file from your history

param.name: stemming_algorithm
param.label: Select the stemming algorithm to be used

param.name: job_name
param.label: Supply a name for the outputs to remind you what they contain

tool.help: Input is a list of tokens, uses one of the NLTK stemming algorithms to generate a list of word stems.
